amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 118-464 to clarify excluded covered data exceptions for user-generated public content, public records, background checks, and Automatic License Plate Readers (ALPR).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Higgins (LA) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Higgins (LA) amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
